Package classes

Class Subject

java.lang.Object
classes.Subject
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Subject extends Object implements Serializable
Represents an academic subject with attributes for subject name, lists of enrolled students and assigned teachers. This class also provides methods for managing these attributes. Implements Serializable for object serialization.
See Also:

    • aSubject

      public static Subject aSubject(ArrayList<Subject> subjects)
      Provides an interactive method to select a subject from a given list of subjects.
      Parameters:
      subjects - The list of subjects from which to choose.
      Returns:
      The selected Subject object.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an input/output exception occurs during user input.
